notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: GHC and QX conceived of the study, and participated in its design and coordination. TTG, LL, JWW, and LLT carried out the experiments. WZW and XSW participated in the design of the study and performed the statistical analysis. TTG and QX contributed to the manuscript preparation. QX and GHC interpreted the results and contributed to edit the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
